pageContext.claim: “What was in a report done by some politicians on the other side, like Warner? What was in the report? That, I don't know? But I know one thing that was in the report: that Donald Trump had absolutely nothing to do with it or with Russia. Is that right? Did you read that?”
pageContext.analysis: The Senate Intelligence Committee’s lengthy investigation further bolstered special counsel Robert Mueller’s findings that Russia engaged in a sweeping and multi pronged effort to influence the outcome of the 2016 election. The report detailed a comprehensive list of contacts between members of the Trump campaign and Kremlin officials and other Russians, including at least one intelligence officer and others tied to the country’s spy services.
